Function Documentation

void DirtyAddrGetInfoXboxOne ( const DirtyAddrT *  pDirtyAddr,
void *  pXuid,
void *  pSecureDeviceAddressBlob,
int32_t *  pBlobSize 
)

Extract Xbox One-specific fields from the given DirtyAddr.

Parameters
*pDirtyAddr- dirtyaddr to decode
*pXuid- [out] storage for decoded XUID
*pSecureDeviceAddressBlob- [out] storage for decode SecureDeviceAddress blob
*pBlobSize- [out] size of decoded SecureDeviceAddress blob (in bytes)
Note
Any undesired outputs may be specified as NULL
Version
04/17/2013 (mclouatre)

References DirtyAddrToHostAddr(), DirtyAddrT::strMachineAddr, and TagFieldGetBinary().

void DirtyAddrSetInfoXboxOne ( DirtyAddrT *  pDirtyAddr,
const void *  pXuid,
const void *  pSecureDeviceAddressBlob,
int32_t  iBlobSize 
)

Set Xbox One-specific fields into the given DirtyAddr.

Parameters
*pDirtyAddr- [out] storage for dirtyaddr
*pXuid- XUID to encode
*pSecureDeviceAddressBlob- SecureDeviceAddress blob to encode
iBlobSize- size of Secure device address code (in bytes)
Version
04/17/2013 (mclouatre)

References DirtyAddrFromHostAddr(), FALSE, DirtyAddrT::strMachineAddr, and TRUE.
